That squirrel has been mocking me from the same branch for 47 minutes. This is not over.
The mail carrier came again. I handled it.
I have been sitting in this sunbeam for two hours and I regret nothing.
Someone moved my spot on the couch. I will be staging a formal protest at 3am.
I heard the word 'bath' from three rooms away. I am already under the bed.
They said 'walkies' but then put on their coat and left without me. I am filing a grievance.
The treat fell behind the fridge. I have been staring at the fridge since Tuesday.
There is a new dog in the neighborhood. I have assessed the situation. The situation is unacceptable.
I do not know why they go to the vet. I do not ask questions about their personal lives either.
I found a smell near the park bench that changed my understanding of the world. I cannot explain further.
They called me 'a good boy' in that voice and I pretended not to care. I cared.
The vacuum is back. It has returned. It is never truly gone.
I have been offered a smaller treat in exchange for the original treat. I will not be negotiating.
Someone rang the doorbell on the television. I addressed it. I would address it again.
I dreamed I caught the squirrel. In the dream, I was not sure what to do next. I still won.
They are eating something and looking at me with what I can only describe as disrespect.
I have been asked to get off the bed. I have considered the request.
The baby visited again. I am monitoring the situation.
A leaf blew past the window. I had words with it.
They put a sweater on me. I wore it with great dignity and I want that on record.
